comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
T-6G serial number 49-2900. These aircraft were not new production, but rather the result of an extreme upgrade and modification process. The aircraft involved were all originally AT-6Cs and Ds, but after the upgrade, they received new construction numbers and serial numbers, as T-6Gs. For the most part, the original serial numbers have been lost because they were of no importance. Once completed, some of the T-6Gs went into USAF service, while others were presented to foreign governments under the MDAP.

Doug MacPhail
